subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Basketball
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Boston Celtics, who are in the N.B.A. finals, and the U.S. men’s soccer team, which is in the World Cup, have adopted the word ubuntu as a rallying cry.
snippet: The Boston Celtics, who are in the N.B.A. finals, and the U.S. men’s soccer team, which is in the World Cup, have adopted the word ubuntu as a rallying cry.
